org.fcrepo.kernel.rdf

Interface IdentifierTranslator

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultIdentifierTranslator, HttpIdentifierTranslator, SpringContextAwareIdentifierTranslator, VersionAwareHttpIdentifierTranslator

    public interface IdentifierTranslator
    Translate internal JCR node identifiers to external Fedora identifiers (and vice versa)
    Since:
    May 15, 2013
    Author:
    barmintor, ajs6f
